designations: Professor, School of Computer Science and Engineering
biography: Dr Seah Hock Soon is a professor at the School of Computer Science and Engineering (SCSE) at Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore. He is the Director of the Centre for Augmented and Virtual Reality (CAVR) leading the overall R&D strategy and management of the College-level centre.
grants: Accelerating traditional workflows in animation and gaming through creative AI solutions
